title: Choosing a new username

replies.body:
Well, in order to make a good username, we need some information about you, first.
What do you like?
What do you dislike?
What is your favorite food?
What's your favorite animal?
What are some of your hobbies?
What's your favorite color?
Yeah, those are the most important questions, in my opinion, you have to know in order to make a username. Good luck! :3
